name: Weird Ball Game (2 Hour Game Challenge)
name_original: Weird Ball Game (2 Hour Game Challenge)
description:
You shrink as time passes all the way into non-existence, only way to prolong your life is by eating golden cubes but beware eating each cube will increase your size making you a bigger target.

This game was created within just 2 hours as a self challenge to myself, it's a pretty simple game but I wanted to experiment with smooth resizing of rigidbodies and create a free camera much like in some third person games.
